name: .XEN File Extension
summary: Learn about .XEN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file used by Guitar Hero III for the Mac or PC; may contain graphics, textures, video, audio or other data used by the game; stored in a package format and usually named "[filename].pak.xen."

content: Guitar Hero III for the PC is published by Aspyr, in partnership with Activision, the original developer of the game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
